title: Dutch Type by 010 publishers
content:
anyone know where i might be able to get a copy of this book?  
appears to be out of print and out of stock at the usual suspects.

thanks,  
jarrod
author: begsini

comments.content: _Dutch Type_ is out of print. Right now the easiest option is the free copy on Google Books: [http://books.google.com/books?id=sR9g5xPPJVQC&printsec=frontcover&dq=dut...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720135004/http:/books.google.com/books?id=sR9g5xPPJVQC&printsec=frontcover&dq=dutch+type&sig=ACfU3U14f_NyOM-FLLIjytvYOv9V6irNJQ "http://books.google.com/books?id=sR9g5xPPJVQC&printsec=frontcover&dq=dutch+type&sig=ACfU3U14f\_NyOM-FLLIjytvYOv9V6irNJQ")

Check out this earlier thread for more info and updates on _Dutch Type_ from the author of the book:

[http://typophile.com/node/45010](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720135004/http:/typophile.com/node/45010 "http://typophile.com/node/45010")
